attributes.additional_details:
i would like purlwell crescent to become a one way street, as when there is 2 way traffic it gets really congested.
would be more safer and can reduce road accidents.
i can go door to door to households to get signatures as i know they will be very happy to have a one way street.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local highway authority (your local county/borough/unitary council).
